The horrible prospect of Supreme Court Justice Elena Kagan

Apr 11, 2010

Obama’s Solicitor General Elena Kagan — has a record that is almost as bad as Sunstein’s when it comes to executive power abuses, civil liberties, and “War on Terror” radicalism.  
via Glenn Greenwald For instance: according to the Los Angeles Times:
Harvard Law Dean Elena Kagan, President Obamaâ€™s choice to represent his administration before the Supreme Court, told a key Republican senator Tuesday that she believed the government could hold suspected terrorists without trial as war prisoners.
